analyzed: gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can //

analyzed: zhes pa nas /

analyzed: ji ltar shes she na /

analyzed: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //

analyzed: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid ;

analyzed: bram ze de yang dri ma dag pa'i phyir rtags la brten nas dpog pa ni / mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das //

analyzed: legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //

analyzed: zhes bya bar rtogs pas so //

analyzed: bde sdug sel bar mthar gyur pa //

analyzed: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //

analyzed: rtags ni 'jig rten pa'i stobs kyis //

original: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
analyzed: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //

analyzed: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //

original: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
analyzed: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //

analyzed: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral // rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //

analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //

analyzed: shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa po //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //

analyzed: ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba //

analyzed: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //

analyzed: de'i don ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par rtags kyi sgo nas shes la /
translated: The meaning of this is understood through the signs of attaining great nirvana.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'phong dang bzo dpe med cing gzhan gyis bskyod par mi nus pas kyang shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'phong dang bzo dpe med cing gzhan gyis bskyod par mi nus pas kyang shes so //
translated: It is also understood through being unrivaled in worldly arts and crafts and being unshakable by others.

original: de gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi phyir zhe na /

analyzed: thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba phra ba dang / dri ma bral ba dang / nyes skyon thams @59b cad zad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is subtle, difficult to realize for all, free from stains, and the exhaustion of all faults and flaws.

original: 'bras bu kun shes pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum du grub bo //
analyzed: 'bras bu kun shes pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum du grub bo //
translated: The essence of omniscience is directly established as the result.

analyzed: de'i phyir / dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //

analyzed: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //

analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin du gnas she na /

analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //

analyzed: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //

analyzed: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //

analyzed: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //

analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //

analyzed: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //

analyzed: gzi brjid phreng ba lta na sdug /'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //

analyzed: lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po //

analyzed: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //

analyzed: sngags ni ye shes lnga'i brda ston pa'o //

analyzed: yid ni dpal be'u'i tshul du zhu ba'i bdag nyid du gnas so //

original: de yang gzhon nu'i rol pa dang skyo bas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba dang / zhi gnas kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu spangs pa /
analyzed: de yang gzhon nu'i rol pa dang skyo bas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba dang / zhi gnas kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu spangs pa /
